product_name: Sunday Organics Soil Booster Soil Amendment
description:
Feed your soil's microbiome

This liquid vermicompost extract works like a probiotic for your yard.

Soil Booster delivers over 1,400 beneficial organisms that improve soil structure and increase nutrient availability. Plants treated with Soil Booster develop larger root systems, tighter internodes for sturdier growth, and produce up to 50% more disease-fighting compounds. Perfect for all plants from vegetables to flowers to newly seeded grass.

At Sunday, we create organic garden solutions without harsh chemicals—so you can get your hands dirty—not your plants.

sections.product_features:
100% vermicompost extract
1,400+ beneficial soil microbes
Increases drought tolerance
Enhanced nutrient availability
CDFA and OMRI organic certified
Safe for edible plants
Dual application - hose on or watering can
sections.ingredients: Vermicompost extract: 100% worm castings compost or organic materials worked by worms
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply during early morning or late evening to avoid direct sunlight. Apply a few days before fertilizing for better nutrient absorption.
Shake well before use
For hose-on application: Attach sprayer to bottle and hose
For watering can: Mix 1 part Soil Boost to 4 parts water
Apply around base of plants - few seconds per plant is sufficient
Use at least three times during growing season, up to once per week
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
What is vermicompost?
Vermicompost is nutrient-rich organic material produced by earthworms. Worms consume organic matter and turn it into "castings" (worm manure). This natural process deactivates harmful bacteria and creates an ideal soil amendment.
What can I use Soil Booster for?
Supports seedling development
Made for turf, fruits, vegetables, cannabis and CEA growing
Aids growth for newly seeded lawn areas
What makes Sunday soil amendment different?
Unlike amendments that only deliver nutrients, Soil Booster focuses on soil health by introducing active microbes that improve microbial balance. This feeds plants and creates a healthier soil ecosystem for long-term plant health.
How to use Soil Booster with other Sunday products?
Apply Soil Booster a few days before using fertilizers for better nutrient absorption. If applying after another product, allow all liquid products to dry completely before application.
Are there any US states where this product is not approved for use?
This product is not approved for use in OR. Registration pending in CA.
